From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To clear interrupt mask details for all processes in the interrupt mask buffer, use the **clear processes interrupt mask detail** command in privileged EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example demonstrates how to the clear interrupt mask statistics from system memory for all processes:
Router# clear processes interrupt mask detail
ExtraInfo: See the documentation of the **scheduler interrupt mask** commands (listed in the Related Commands table) for further details on process interrupt mask profiling.

RelatedCmds.description: Starts interrupt mask profiling for all processes running on the system
Configures the maximum number of entries that can exist in the interrupt mask buffer.
Configures the maximum time that a process can run with interrupts masked.
Displays the information stored in the interrupt mask buffer.
Displays interrupt masked details for the specified processes or all processes in the system.
